cold war.translation[0].definitions[0].d: an unfriendly political relationship between two countries who do not actually fight each other
cold war.translation[1].definitions[0].d: the unfriendly relationship between the US and the USSR after the Second World War, when there was very little trade between the two countries
cold war.translation[1].definitions[0].e: Despite the end of the Cold War, the NATO alliance continues to expand.
